highlights: Currently engaged under two active contracts, delivering high-impact engineering solutions for early-stage and growth-phase companies
Leading end-to-end system design and implementation, including backend architecture, cloud infrastructure, and production-grade deployment pipelines
Partnering directly with founders and stakeholders to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions, acting as both execution lead and technical advisor
Driving performance optimization, reliability improvements, and cost-efficient cloud architectures while maintaining rapid iteration cycles
Implementing and continuously refining DevOps best practices, including CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and infrastructure as code, to accelerate delivery velocity and improve system reliability
Managing and scaling the organization’s codebase using an NX monorepo architecture, driving modularity, consistency, and long-term maintainability across multiple projects
Establishing engineering standards and workflows to support collaborative development and reduce operational friction across teams
Architected and implemented a modern, scalable distributed system leveraging serverless infrastructure to support rapid growth and operational efficiency
Designed and optimized high-throughput data pipelines using Kafka, integrating backend databases to enable real-time processing and analytics
Led backend development of core business logic and successfully navigated a full end-to-end compliance audit, ensuring strict regulatory adherence
Owned the mobile application development lifecycle from concept to production release, maintaining strict alignment with brand design standards and UX requirements
